=========================

ID: CFTBL18_00
From: Cigna Healthcare MEA Communications <communications@mea.comms.cigna.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-30 14:02
Subject: We’re tuning up how you tune into ConnectForHealth
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

ConnectForHealth is getting an upgrade! 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B4d73e706-27b2-410c-9786-6c60ba53f72d%7D_sound_waves_header.png> 	

ConnectForHealth is getting an upgrade! 


Big update! 


ConnectForHealth — currently featuring monthly webinars is getting an upgrade! Cigna Healthcare is delighted to bring you a refreshed perspective on wellness.

We’re making it easier and more exciting than ever to get practical insights from experts. This new format is not only good for your well-being, but also good for your schedule — it’s on your time and terms. 

We can’t share all the details just yet, but stay tuned for our announcement, where a familiar voice will be bringing this exciting experience to life in a new and engaging way.

We can’t share all the details just yet, but stay tuned for our announcement, where a familiar voice will be bringing this exciting experience to life in a new and engaging way.

Supporting your well-being, your way.
Cigna Healthcare MEA
